# Factorio Agent Report - Step 8

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator near position (-9.5, -0.5)
This structure generates power for the base.
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at position (x=-4.0, y=1.5)
- Steam Engine at position (x=2.5, y=3.5)
- Steam Engine at position (x=2.5, y=6.5)
- PipeGroup connecting Offshore Pump to Boiler (fluid=water, position=x=-8.5 y=-0.5)
- PipeGroup connecting Boiler to Steam Engines (fluid=steam, position=x=-2.5 y=1.5)
- ElectricityGroup connecting Steam Engines
